message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to make you an offer. After careful consideration, I'm willing to sell this product to you for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm hoping to get it a little lower. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to negotiate the price. After re-evaluating the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $875,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still a little high, though.  How about $860,000?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $860,000, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm offering the product to you for $870,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
